author: Andy Pearson
method: Place the vodka, limes (except the garnish) and sugar into a highball glass and carefully 'muddle' or pound with the end of a clean rolling pin. Add a handful of ice, garnish with a lime wedge and serve.
ingredients: 60ml/2¼fl oz vodka,  1½ limes, cut into quarters,  1 tbsp granulated sugar,  handful ice,  1 lime wedge, to garnish
